com.github.kpgtb.ktools.manager.cache

Class CacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.kpgtb.ktools.manager.cache.CacheManager

  • public class CacheManager
extends Object
    CacheManager stores small data in object metadata or in files

        public <T> void setData(Object target,
                        String pluginName,
                        String key,
                        T data)
        With this method you can save data to cache
        Parameters:
        target - Object where you want to save data (or null if cacheSource is SERVER)
        pluginName - Name of plugin that save this data
        key - Key of data
        data - Object with data

        pluginName - Name of plugin that save this data
        key - Key of data
        data - Object with data

                       String pluginName,

      • getData

        @Nullable
public <T> T getData(Object target,
                                String pluginName,
                                String key,
                                Class<T> expected)
        This method returns data from cache
        Parameters:
        target - Object from you want to get data (or null if cacheSource is SERVER)
        pluginName - Name of plugin that saves this data
        key - Key of data
        expected - Class that is expected in return
        Returns:
        Object with data or null if there isn't any data

public <T> T getServerData(String pluginName,
                                      String key,
                                      Class<T> expected)

        key - Key of data

        Returns:

      • getDataOr

        @NotNull
public <T> T getDataOr(Object target,
                                 String pluginName,
                                 String key,
                                 T or)
        This method returns data from cache or defined data
        Parameters:
        target - Object from you want to get data (or null if cacheSource is SERVER)
        pluginName - Name of plugin that saves this data
        key - Key of data
        or - Data that should be returned when data is null
        Returns:
        Object with data

      • getServerDataOr

        @NotNull
public <T> T getServerDataOr(String pluginName,
                                       String key,
                                       T or)
        This method returns data from server's cache or defined data
        Parameters:
        pluginName - Name of plugin that saves this data
        key - Key of data
        or - Data that should be returned when data is null
        Returns:
        Object with data

      • hasData

        public <T> boolean hasData(Object target,
                           String pluginName,
                           String key,
                           Class<T> expected)
        This method checks if cache contains data
        Parameters:
        target - Object from you want to get data (or null if cacheSource is SERVER)
        pluginName - Name of plugin that saves this data
        key - Key of data
        expected - Class that should be checked
        Returns:
        true if exists
        Since:
        1.3.0
